short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically resizes and zooms physics and maths tutor pdfs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will automatically resize physics and maths tutor pdfs. These pdfs have whitespace around them by default and this extension removes it for you.
